text:
Anyone can share some insights how you handle dynamic content on landing pages?
Specifically, if you have landing page set up where you personalise based on a previous page visit how are you doing that?

We have new product pages where we are linking to a Book a demo HS landing page with a form and I would like to reference the product where they came from. Even submit a datapoint on this demo booking were coming off a certain product.
How are you setting these up in general? Any tips?

Hi app partners, we're looking to build out HubSpot's observability capabilities and would love to hear from you --
1. What kind of observability do you use for UIE?
2. What other observability capabilities can we provide to better help you?"
Hi Everyone, Does anyone know how can I use a video player pop-up in HubSpot webpage?

Does anyone know what determines the order of the tags on a blog post, stored in `content.topic_list`? Is it when the tag was created? I added the tags in the order of `home` `home-top` `Featured`, but it puts `Featured` before `home-top`. Not really understanding why.
Make a module using a popup with a video player and then add it to your page

Hi everyone, I have a thank you landing page which displays the FirstName of the Contact who submitted a HubSpot Form. The form to landing page redirect happens on form submit. Although when the Thankyou page loads it does not display the personalization. If I wait a few seconds and refresh the landing page then the personalization appears. Anyone has had this roadblock? I think adding a timer module might help here but would like to know any other solution to this is problem?
